thread.title_full: DJ Khaled Releases New Beyonc√© and Jay Z Song "Shining"

author: Kristina Rodulfo
title: DJ Khaled Releases New Beyonc√© Jay Z "Shining"
text:
Beyonc√© may not have won album of the year at tonight's Grammys , but she's still giving us the surprise gift of new music. Following the show, DJ Khaled debuted "Shining," featuring Bey and Jay Z, on Tidal . It's the first single from his upcoming album Grateful, and the track is the first the couple have been on together since "Drunk In Love" from Beyonce in 2013.
